channel.title: Clicking Buttons
channel.description:
Ok, well what code would I add to my client.java for the server to output the ID of the button of the interface I am clicking? Please help :p
Looked at the Objects version and got this
[code]System.out.println("atObject: " + objectX + "," + objectY+ " objectID: " + objectID); // 147 might be id for[/code]
Now how would I edit it to outwrite the button ID?
